meta.name: Crystal Technology Tree
meta.description: Season of Conquest Crystal Tech Tree

quenchedBladesI.name: Quenched Blades I
quenchedBladesI.description: Increases the Attack of your Infantry units

swiftMarchingI.name: Swift Marching I
swiftMarchingI.description: Increases the March Speed of your Infantry units

improvedBowsI.name: Improved Bows I
improvedBowsI.description: Increases the Attack of your Archer units

fleetOfFootI.name: Fleet of Foot I
fleetOfFootI.description: Increases the March Speed of your Archer units

mountedCombatTechniquesI.name: Mounted Combat Techniques I
mountedCombatTechniquesI.description: Increases the Attack of your Cavalry units

swiftSteedsI.name: Swift Steeds I
swiftSteedsI.description: Increases the March Speed of your Cavalry units

improvedProjectilesI.name: Improved Projectiles I
improvedProjectilesI.description: Increases the Attack of your Siege units

reinforcedAxlesI.name: Reinforced Axles I
reinforcedAxlesI.description: Increases the March Speed of your Siege units

callToArmsI.name: Call To Arms I
callToArmsI.description: Increases the Unit Capacity of your commanders

cuttingCornersI.name: Cutting Corners I
cuttingCornersI.description: Reduces the number of Crystals required to research Crystal Research Center Technologies

culturalExchange.name: Cultural Exchange
culturalExchange.description: Increases Favor and Crystals gained from completing Bastion Quests

leadershipI.name: Leadership I
leadershipI.description: Increases the Unit Capacity of alliance rallied armies you initiate

barbarianBounties.name: Barbarian Bounties
barbarianBounties.description: Increases damage dealt to Barbarian Patrols and Barbarian Forts in the Lost Kingdom. Increases Crystals earned from defeating them

callToArmsII.name: Call To Arms II
callToArmsII.description: Further increases the Unit Capacity of your commanders

karakuReports.name: Karaku Reports
karakuReports.description: Increases damage dealt to all Karaku warriors and Crystals earned per hour in the Trial of Kau Karuak event

cuttingCornersII.name: Cutting Corners II
cuttingCornersII.description: Further reduces the number of Crystals required to research Crystal Research Center Technologies

leadershipII.name: Leadership II
leadershipII.description: Further increases the Unit Capacity of alliance rallied armies you initiate

quenchedBladesII.name: Quenched Blades II
quenchedBladesII.description: Increases the Attack of your Infantry units

improvedBowsII.name: Improved Bows II
improvedBowsII.description: Increases the Attack of your Archer units

mountedCombatTechniquesII.name: Mounted Combat Techniques II
mountedCombatTechniquesII.description: Increases the Attack of your Cavalry units

improvedProjectilesII.name: Improved Projectiles II
improvedProjectilesII.description: Increases the Attack of your Siege units

starmetalShields.name: Starmetal Shields
starmetalShields.description: Increases the Defense of your Infantry units

starmetalBracers.name: Starmetal Bracers
starmetalBracers.description: Increases the Defense of your Archer units

starmetalBarding.name: Starmetal Barding
starmetalBarding.description: Increases the Defense of your Cavalry units

starmetalAxles.name: Starmetal Axles
starmetalAxles.description: Increases the Defense of your Siege units

swiftMarchingII.name: Swift Marching II
swiftMarchingII.description: Further increases the March Speed of your Infantry units

fleetOfFootII.name: Fleet of Foot II
fleetOfFootII.description: Further increases the March Speed of your Archer units

swiftSteedsII.name: Swift Steeds II
swiftSteedsII.description: Further increases the March Speed of your Cavalry units

reinforcedAxlesII.name: Reinforced Axles II
reinforcedAxlesII.description: Further increases the March Speed of your Siege units

runecraft.name: Runecraft
runecraft.description: Unlocks the ability to summon a rune of your choice

specialConcoctionsI.name: Special Concoctions I
specialConcoctionsI.description: Reduces the resource cost of healing Tier 5 troops

expandedFormationsI.name: Expanded Formations I
expandedFormationsI.description: Increases your troop dispatch limit by 1

rapidRetreat.name: Rapid Retreat
rapidRetreat.description: Unlocks the ability to use Gems to instantly return defeated troops to your city - 80 gems per march

ironInfantry.name: Iron Infantry
ironInfantry.description: Increases the Health of your Infantry units

archersFocus.name: Archer's Focus
archersFocus.description: Increases the Health of your Archer units

ridersResilience.name: Rider's Resilience
ridersResilience.description: Increases the Health of your Cavalry units

siegeProvisions.name: Siege Provisions
siegeProvisions.description: Increases the Health of your Siege units

swiftMarchingIII.name: Swift Marching III
swiftMarchingIII.description: Further increases the March Speed of your Infantry units

fleetOfFootIII.name: Fleet of Foot III
fleetOfFootIII.description: Further increases the March Speed of your Archer units

swiftSteedsIII.name: Swift Steeds III
swiftSteedsIII.description: Further increases the March Speed of your Cavalry units

reinforcedAxlesIII.name: Reinforced Axles III
reinforcedAxlesIII.description: Further increases the March Speed of your Siege units

specialConcoctionsII.name: Special Concoctions II
specialConcoctionsII.description: Further reduces the resource cost of healing Tier 5 troops

expandedFormationsII.name: Expanded Formations II
expandedFormationsII.description: Increases your troop dispatch limit by 1

infantryExpert.name: Infantry Expert
infantryExpert.description: Your units take less damage from and deal more damage to Infantry units

archerExpert.name: Archer Expert
archerExpert.description: Your units take less damage from and deal more damage to Archer units

cavalryExpert.name: Cavalry Expert
cavalryExpert.description: Your units take less damage from and deal more damage to Cavalry units

siegeExpert.name: Siege Expert
siegeExpert.description: Your units take less damage from and deal more damage to Siege units

surpriseStrike.name: Surprise Strike
surpriseStrike.description: Increases damage your field troops deal to enemy rallied armies and garrisons in the Lost Kingdom
